summary: Test suite exercising the SecureDrop client storage synchronization logic, including discovery of new files, messages and replies, handling of deletions, updates to user and source metadata, marking download and decryption status, and managing edge cases such as race conditions.
business_intent: Ensure that the SecureDrop client reliably syncs local storage with the remote server, correctly processes encrypted submissions, messages and replies, maintains data integrity, and updates user and source information as required.
